class.name: MetaPlatformSDK_ApplicationOptions
class.brief_description: Represents the options for launching an app.
class.description: Represents the options for launching an app.

method.name: set_deeplink_message
method.description: A message to be passed to a launched app, which can be retrieved from [method MetaPlatformSDK.application_lifecycle_get_launch_details] via the [member MetaPlatformSDK_LaunchDetails.deeplink_message] property.

method.name: set_destination_api_name
method.description: If provided, the intended destination to be passed to the launched app.

method.name: set_lobby_session_id
method.description: If provided, the intended lobby where the launched app should take the user. All users with the same lobby_session_id should end up grouped together in the launched app.

method.name: set_match_session_id
method.description: If provided, the intended instance of the destination that a user should be launched into.
